title: The Sacred Water Odyssey
name: 15-Day New Year Kerala Wellness & Cultural Immersion Journey
description: Welcome the new year in Kerala's lush, post-monsoon beauty. This journey of renewal is woven around sacred water ceremonies, Ayurvedic healing, and gentle spiritual awakening.
shortDescription: Transformational 15-day New Year Kerala journey with sacred waterfalls, backwater cruises, spice plantation walks & comprehensive Ayurvedic healing.
highlights: Sacred New Year's Eve fire ceremony with live Sufi music
Private backwater houseboat cruise through Kumarakom canals
Periyar wildlife sanctuary sunrise boat safari in spice hills
Comprehensive 3-day Ayurvedic healing program by the ocean
Village homestay experiences with authentic Kerala families
Fort Kochi colonial heritage walks through ancient spice markets

schema.name: 15-Day New Year Kerala Wellness & Cultural Immersion Journey
schema.description: Transformational 15-day New Year Kerala journey with sacred waterfalls, backwater cruises, spice plantation walks & comprehensive Ayurvedic healing.

title: The Living Traditions Trail
name: 15-Day North Kerala Wellness & Cultural Immersion Journey
description: Dive into the vibrant heart of North Kerala's rural culture. A richly textured journey for food lovers and spiritual seekers, connecting you to timeless village rhythms and temple wisdom.
shortDescription: 15-day mystical North Kerala journey with authentic Theyyam rituals, tribal culture immersion, beach yoga & traditional Ayurvedic treatments.
highlights: Exclusive access to authentic Theyyam temple ceremonies
Tribal community immersion with Kurichya and Kurumba elders
Silent bamboo rafting meditation through Wayanad forests
UNESCO heritage Vadakkunnathan Temple with private priest tours
Kerala mural painting workshops using traditional techniques
Coastal Ayurvedic retreat with personalized healing programs

schema.name: 15-Day North Kerala Wellness & Cultural Immersion Journey
schema.description: 15-day mystical North Kerala journey with authentic Theyyam rituals, tribal culture immersion, beach yoga & traditional Ayurvedic treatments.

title: The Spirit of Karnataka
name: 15-Day South India Wellness & Cultural Immersion Journey
description: Explore the regal soul of Karnataka. This path is defined by slow mornings of Mysore yoga, the sacred silence of ancient temples, and stories etched in stone and silk.
shortDescription: 15-day transformational South India journey through Karnataka with daily yoga, Ayurvedic therapies, heritage locations & cultural immersion.
highlights: Daily yoga sessions with founder-led spiritual guidance
Private Mysore Palace tours with heritage experts
Authentic Ayurvedic healing program in Udupi coastal retreat
Wildlife safari at Nagarhole National Park (Kabini)
Jain heritage immersion in peaceful Karkala
Small group cultural bridge experiences with local families

schema.name: 15-Day South India Wellness & Cultural Immersion Journey
schema.description: 15-day transformational South India journey through Karnataka with daily yoga, Ayurvedic therapies, heritage locations & cultural immersion.
